attributes.action: Repeal the Government of Wales Acts 1998 and 2006 because they have failed to offer any real benefit to the taxpayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Welsh Assembly Government is an unnecessary layer of bureaucracy and without a cost benefit analysis which demonstrates with clarity that it does add value to the lives of all the electorate of the UK, including Wales, it cannot be justified. For it to benefit only a minority of Welsh Nationalists at the expense of the majority of ordinary people, particularly those who choose to speak English or any language other than Welsh is not democratic, we refuse to be discriminated against at every turn.
